text:
Merge pull request #33 from eneim/release/1.2.0

Release/1.2.0
adds option to not request audio focus

I noticed that ToroVideoView always requests the AudioFocus of the device.

This is a simplistic approach to allow background audio.
title: Option audio focus

text: Hi there, thanks for your PR. I'm AKF for now. Please wait for the review, I'll check out ASAP.
Really tiny fix: please add one space between ```){``` (here and else where). Please keep the code format too.
title: (None, '', u'toro/src/main/java/im/ene/lab/toro/widget/ToroVideoView.java')

text: No problem found. I understand that you would like to allow this VideoView to have background playback. This sounds non-sense for Toro since it will play Video only on foreground. But for a wider usage, I support this PR. Please review my comment, make the fix so I could merge it. Thanks.
Thanks @wemped , I would like to wait for response from another issue which may relates to this PR in one day then I will merge this.

title: Pull request merge from wemped/Toro:option-audio-focus to eneim/Toro:develop
